title: The Ark Brought to Jerusalem
summary: David brings the Ark of the Covenant to Jerusalem with great celebration. When Uzzah touches the Ark and dies, the procession pauses. After three months, David successfully brings the Ark, dancing before the Lord. Michal, Saul’s daughter, criticizes him and is left childless.

faq.question: Why did Uzzah die?
faq.answer: He touched the Ark, which was forbidden, showing irreverence for God's holiness.

faq.question: How did David celebrate the Ark’s arrival?
faq.answer: He danced with all his might before the Lord.
